sql.name: INSERT_USER_SQL
sql.query: INSERT INTO USER(user_id, email, nickname, name, pw, delete_y_n, input_date) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 0, now())

sql.name: GET_USER_SQL
sql.query: SELECT id, user_id, email, nickname, name, pw, delete_y_n, input_date FROM USER WHERE ID=?

sql.name: MODIFY_USER_SQL
sql.query: UPDATE USER SET email=? ,nickname=? ,name=? ,pw=? WHERE id=?

sql.name: VALID_IDPW_USER_SQL
sql.query: SELECT id, user_id, email, nickname, name, pw, delete_y_n, input_date FROM USER WHERE user_id= ? AND pw= ? AND delete_y_n=0

sql.name: DELETE_USER_SQL
sql.query: UPDATE USER SET delete_y_n=1 WHERE id= ?

sql.name: LIST_USER_SQL
sql.query: SELECT id, user_id, email, nickname, name, pw, delete_y_n, input_date FROM USER LIMIT ?, ?
